pr_title: DHFPROD-5743: Handling case where docs have multiple job IDs

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5743: Handling case where docs have multiple job IDs

timeline.bodyText: In other words hubFixCreatedByStep wont work for ingested records since they dont have the necessary prov?
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5743: Handling case where docs have multiple job IDs

Using wasAssociatedWith now, which is set on ingestions - wasInfluencedBy is not (which is a separate bug I'll write up).
